comments:
when constructor CombinedTemplateCreationEntry(
  String label,
  String shortDesc,
  Object template,
  CreationFactory factory,
  ImageDescriptor iconSmall,
  ImageDescriptor iconLarge) is passed null for icon images, it is not drawed

ImageFigure has a field size, which it initializes to 0,0 when setImage is
called if the image is null. However, in getPreferredSize, the javadoc states
that it will return 0,0 if no image has been set - yet it setImage was never
called the size is null. Added code to initialize size to 0,0 in
getPreferredSize() if it is null.
